law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 476, Pt. VI, sec. 616, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1985 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 7, effective October 18, 1985. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 1, effective March 27, 1984.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Twenty-five cent school levy tax by district school board necessary for eligibility for state power equalization support.
